      • getSensors

        public java.util.List<ISensor<? extends java.lang.Number>> getSensors​(Greenhouse greenhouse,
                                                                      ADC adc)
                                                               throws ProxyRequestFailException
        Get all sensors from the API.
        Parameters:
        greenhouse - The greenhouse where the sensor are attached to.
        adc - The AdC to use to read the sensor.
        Returns:
        List of all sensors.
        Throws:
        ProxyRequestFailException - If the request fails.
